casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. GONG SIK WING, Brother and Next Friend of Gong Sik Ho, Relator-Appellee, v. Rudolph REIMER, Commissioner of Immigration, Chinese Inspector in Charge of the Port of New York, Respondent-Appellant. No. 140. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 7, 1938. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (John W. Knox, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. M. Michael Edelstein, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court
